tool_description: This service provides a randomly selected video from our robust database, encapsulating various key video details such as title, tags, duration, video ID, published datetime, channel name, and channel ID. It's an ideal tool for developers seeking to enrich their applications with unexpected TikTok content, marketers exploring emerging trends, or any curious minds who enjoy the thrill of the unexpected. Step into the dynamic world of TikTok in a completely novel way with the TikTok Random Vide...
name: TikTok Random Video Generator
title: TikTok Random Video Generator

api_list.name: Random Video
api_list.description: Fetches a random TikTok video based on the applied filters and returns the video details.

optional_parameters.name: maxDuration
optional_parameters.description: (PRO/ULTRA/MEGA) Specify the Maximum Duration: Set a limit (in seconds) to only receive TikTok videos that do not exceed this duration. If omitted, videos of all durations may be returned.

optional_parameters.name: minDuration
optional_parameters.description: (PRO/ULTRA/MEGA) Specify the minimum duration (in seconds) to only receive TikTok videos that are at least this long. If omitted, videos of all durations may be returned.
